pull.title: test: Replace 0xC0 constant
pull.body: Instead it should be the named constant `LEAF_VERSION_TAPSCRIPT`.

events.message:
test: Replace 0xC0 constant

Instead it should be the named constant `LEAF_VERSION_TAPSCRIPT`.

events.body: Updated.  I've left `VALID_LEAF_VERS` alone because, logically speaking, the definition of the valid tapleaf versions (defined in BIP-341) is independent of the choice of which tapleaf version to assign to tapscript (defined in BIP-342).
